Articles.Content:
This is one of two Crafts posted on the Spacecraft Exchange if you would like to try your Hover Craft Skills, it is supported by the HCFS4 Fuel Support Hover Craft that can drop a Mobile Jumbo Orange Fuel Tank for refueling your Hover Craft Hover Craft HC6 ![p>

**Edited July 12, 2015 by castille7**
